name: Neospeech
tag_list: text-to-speech, tts, asr, mrcp, aac, sapi, hmm, hts
overview:
NeoSpeech was originally founded by two speech engineers, Stanford PhD and Carnegie Mellon PhD in Fremont, California in 2002, with the support of parent company VoiceWare.

NeoSpeech is one of the fastest growing providers of speech technology and applications for the mobile, enterprise, entertainment and education markets. NeoSpeech VoiceText™ TTS software is available for a broad range of embedded devices, desktop and network/server applications including, but not limited to, the following:

  • Computer Telephony Integration (CTI) : call center, telemarketing applications.
  • E-learning: Authoring and language education applications.
  • Consumer Applications: games, AAC, medical devices, ATMs etc.
  • Web Integration.
  • Embedded Applications: iOS, Android, embedded Linux etc.
  • PA/Alert Systems: Disaster response/prevention.
  • Navigation Systems: PND or car navigation.

NeoSpeech text-to-speech software is available in US English, Latin America Spanish, UK English, Mandarin Chinese, Japanese and Korean. NeoSpeech, Inc. is privately held and headquartered in Santa Clara, California.

NeoSpeech engineers work tirelessly to create state-of-the art TTS software and services. We constantly strive to develop new languages, voices and innovations in speech technologies to satisfy our clients’ needs.
